description: A bid to consider the viability of a standalone sub-post office network is rejected by Tynwald.
title: Tynwald accused of 'turning back' on sub-post offices
title_page: Tynwald accused of 'turning back' on sub-post offices - BBC News
maintext: There are 19 sub-post offices on the island, which are all contracted by the Isle of Man Post Office, after three closed in Ballasalla, Sulby and St John's over the last year.
